"legend_box_size": 12, "logarithmic": false, "margin": 20, "margin_bottom": null, "margin_left": null, "margin_right": null, "margin_top": null, "max_scale": 16, "min_scale": 4, "missing_value_fill_truncation": "x", "no_data_text": "No data", "no_prefix": false, "order_min": null, "pretty_print": false, "print_labels": false, "print_values": false, "print_values_position": "stroke_style": null, "style": {"background": "rgba(249, 249, 249, 1)", "ci_colors": [], "colors": ["#F44336", "#3F51B5", "#009688", "#FFC107", "#FF5722", "#9C27B0", "#03A9F4", "#8BC34A", "#FF9800", "foreground": "rgba(0, 0, 0, .87)", "foreground_strong": "rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)", "foreground_subtle": "rgba(0, 0, 0, .54)", "guide_stroke_color": "black", "guide_stroke_dasharray": "4,4",
